title: TNF Preview, Week 4 WR/CB Matchups 2022
description:
Field Yates, Mike Clay and Daniel Dopp preview Thursday Night Football before telling us the WR’s who NEED to be in your lineup this week and who you need to bench. Then, Adam Schefter joins to talk the storylines to watch this week including why Dak could be back next week and a RB to put on your radar.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Field Yates, Stephania Bell, Mike Clay, Daniel Dopp
itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus; What WR's NEED To Be In Your Lineup? Adam Schefter Joins The Show
